channel.title: Adding commands
channel.description:
anyone know how too add theses commands: items tele xp
thanks for the help

item.title: Adding commands
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Hmm… this is making no sense to me, but this is a layout for commands…

Exp command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME"));
         {
   addSkillXP(Exp, skill#); 

   sendMessage("Message"); 
}

[code]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME"));
         {
   addItem(ItemID, amount); 

   sendMessage("Message"); 
}

[code]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME"));
         {
   teleToX = COORDS; 
   teleToY = COORDS;
   sendMessage("Message"); 
}

I believe thats correct, never was the wiz with commands… Hate commands… so useless.[/code][/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Adding commands
item.dc:creator: @Serizzim Serizzim
item.description:
@Serizzim wrote:

As much as I know, this IS the correct section… It is about client hacking…

RS Private Server Client Hacking Rules

This section looked like crap! I have reset it to make it look better. This section is meant for ONLY topics that have to do with clients. Here are the few rules you are expected to follow:

  1. Post ONLY client-related topics in this section.
  2. No more server crashers or cheat programs, it ruins it for all the players & server owners who have put in time and effort. Failure to follow this one will result in a ban.
  3. Do not copy other people’s client tutorials or downloads or you will be banned. We do not steal things from each other in this community.
  4. DO NOT SPAM OR FLAME IN THIS SECTION!
    5. This section is meant for downloads, questions, tutorials, and development topics ALL relating to CLIENTS!

Follow my rules or get banned. It is as simple as that.

Anyways… Answer please? I wanna know that too… At least how to add teleport commands, thats what I wan’t most…

Read full topic
